name: Eli
description:
Popularity and Power - We All Want It!

But where does it come from?

  • Explore power and influence people
  • Play nice. Play mean. Experience the consequences
  • Play on the fiercest proving ground created by mankind: primary school

What will you do different?

Theme

At the core ‘Eli’ is a study in power between individuals, explored through a backdrop of bullying. Or, if you like, a look at bullying through the lens of power. The game is set at primary school, among children, as we are less inhibited before our morale develops.

In short, we think ‘Eli’ provides a great take on everyday power between individuals, with some neat game mechanics you just might not have seen before.

Platform

PC

Team Credits

Andreas Olsson
